scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Members}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($headerTemplateId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('headerTemplateId'))
$core_v2_language.GetResource('JoinedVisited_And')

    $core_v2_language.GetResource('NoMatchingUsers')
    #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.memberSearch') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="AccountStatus_Any">With any status</resource> <resource name="AccountStatus_ApprovalPending">Pending approval</resource> <resource name="AccountStatus_Approved">Approved</resource> <resource name="AccountStatus_Banned">Banned</resource> <resource name="AccountStatus_Disapproved">Disapproved</resource> <resource name="AccountStatus_PendingDeletion">Pending Deletion</resource> <resource name="Action_Add">Add Member</resource> <resource name="Action_ChangeStatuses_Approved">Approve</resource> <resource name="Action_ChangeStatuses_Banned">Temporarily Ban</resource> <resource name="Action_ChangeStatuses_Disapproved">Disapprove</resource> <resource name="Action_ClearSelection">Clear Selection</resource> <resource name="Action_Delete">Delete</resource> <resource name="Action_Export">Export</resource> <resource name="Action_ExportAsCSV">Export as CSV</resource> <resource name="Action_ExportAsCSV_Selected">Export {0} as CSV</resource> <resource name="Action_ExportAsCSV_SelectedOne">Export {0} as CSV</resource> <resource name="Action_ExportSelectedAsCSV">Export {0} as CSV</resource> <resource name="Action_ModifyMember">Modify {0} Member</resource> <resource name="Action_ModifyMembers">Modify {0} Members</resource> <resource name="Ban">Ban</resource> <resource name="Ban_User">Ban {0} Member</resource> <resource name="Ban_Users">Ban {0} Members</resource> <resource name="BanConfirm">Are you user you want to ban these members?</resource> <resource name="BanInstructions">To ban these members, select the reason and duration of the ban. If you would rather permanently prevent these members from accessing the site, consider setting their account status to 'Disapproved' or deleting their accounts.</resource> <resource name="BanReason_Advertising">Advertising</resource> <resource name="BanReason_Aggressive">Aggressive</resource> <resource name="BanReason_BadSignature">Bad signature</resource> <resource name="BanReason_BadUsername">Bad user name</resource> <resource name="BanReason_BanDodging">Ban dodging</resource> <resource name="BanReason_Other">Other</resource> <resource name="BanReason_Profanity">Profanity</resource> <resource name="BanReason_Spam">SPAM</resource> <resource name="BanSuccessful">The members have been banned successfully.</resource> <resource name="cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="ChangeStatus_Confirm">Are you sure you want to change the account status of these members?</resource> <resource name="ChangeStatus_Successful">The members account statuses have been updated successfully.</resource> <resource name="CreateInstructions">Add a member below. You'll be able to set additional options after completing this form.</resource> <resource name="CreateSuccessful">The member was added successfully.</resource> <resource name="CreateUser">Add a Member</resource> <resource name="Delete">Delete</resource> <resource name="Delete_User">Delete {0} Member</resource> <resource name="Delete_Users">Delete {0} Members</resource> <resource name="DeleteConfirm">Are you sure you want to delete these members?</resource> <resource name="DeleteInstructions">To delete these members, select how you would like to handle these members' content. You can choose to merge or reassign it to another user or delete it along with the members.</resource> <resource name="DeleteScheduled">The members have been successfully scheduled for deletion.</resource> <resource name="DeleteSuccessful">The members have been deleted successfully.</resource> <resource name="Edit">Edit</resource> <resource name="ExactMatch">Best Match</resource> <resource name="ExportInstructions">Select the fields to include in the export.</resource> <resource name="Field_BannedUntil">Banned Until</resource> <resource name="Field_BannedUntil_Desc">The date through which these members will be banned from accessing the site.</resource> <resource name="Field_BanReason">Ban Reason</resource> <resource name="Field_BanReason_Desc">The reason for banning these members. This will be visible to the members when they attempt to access the site.</resource> <resource name="Field_ContentReassignment">What do you want to do with these members' content?</resource> <resource name="Field_DoNotReassign">Delete all of these members' content permanently</resource> <resource name="Field_DoNotReassign_Desc">All of these members' content will be deleted. Note that this is done via a background process and will take several minutes to complete.</resource> <resource name="Field_Email">Private email address</resource> <resource name="Field_Email_Desc">The email address used to communicate with this member.</resource> <resource name="Field_MergeToUser">Merge into: </resource> <resource name="Field_MergeToUser_Placeholder">Select member...</resource> <resource name="Field_Password1">Password</resource> <resource name="Field_Password1_Desc">The password used by this member to login.</resource> <resource name="Field_Password2">Password verification</resource> <resource name="Field_Password2_Desc">Please enter the same password to ensure it was typed correctly.</resource> <resource name="Field_ReassignToFormerMember">Reassign to {0}</resource> <resource name="Field_ReassignToFormerMember_Desc">By reassigning to this system account, the content is preserved while also not artificially benefiting any real user via point or achievement awards.</resource> <resource name="Field_ReassignToUser">Reassign to: </resource> <resource name="Field_ReassignToUser_Desc">Note that assigning content to an existing user will result in the new user being credited with points and/or achievements because of their inherited content.</resource> <resource
